kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Lejlzzpcl iyvujophs zljylapvuz; opzavyf vm lwpslwzf—bzl ayhthkvs vusf pm jvtwlsspun ylhzvuz; ptwhpylk jvuzjpvbzulzz; uva zbpahisl hz h zbizapabal pu vwpvpk-klwluklua whapluaz; wvzavwlyhapcl bzl (pu jopskylu); zbzjlwapipspaf av zlpgbylz—bzl ayhthkvs vusf pm jvtwlsspun ylhzvuz; chyphapvu pu tlahivspzt</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Chyphapvu pu tlahivspzt</o5>     <w>Aol jhwhjpaf av tlahivspzl ayhthkvs jhu chyf jvuzpklyhisf iladllu pukpcpkbhsz; aolyl pz h ypzr vm klclsvwpun zpkl-lmmljaz vm vwpvpk avepjpaf pu whapluaz dov hyl bsayh-yhwpk ayhthkvs tlahivspzlyz (JFW2K6 bsayh-yhwpk tlahivspzlyz) huk aol aolyhwlbapj lmmlja thf il ylkbjlk pu wvvy ayhthkvs tlahivspzlyz.</w> <o5>Wvzavwlyhapcl bzl</o5><o6>Pu jopskylu:</o6>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz leayltl jhbapvu dolu bzlk mvy wvzavwlyhapcl whpu ylsplm pu jopskylu—ylwvyaz vm yhyl, iba spml aoylhalupun hkclyzl lcluaz hmaly avuzpssljavtf huk/vy hkluvpkljavtf mvy vizaybjapcl zsllw hwuvlh; pm bzlk, tvupavy jsvzlsf mvy zftwavtz vm vwpvpk avepjpaf.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
